subject: nightly build feature
msgSnippet: Does Junit has any feature called nightly build feature ? Which will run everynight & will identify the issues if any from newly developed code? If not then is
messageBody:
Does Junit has any feature called nightly build feature ? Which will
run everynight & will identify the issues if any from newly developed
code?
If not then is there a way to achieve this?
Thanks
Kshitija
